title: Cobb Salad With Alan Ruck
description: It's time to clear the docket! This week, Helen Zaltzman (The Allusionist, Veronica Mars Investigations) joins Judge Hodgman and Bailiff Jesse to discuss Alan Ruck, angry customer service letters, audiobooks, soap conservation, cemetery walks, anonymous letters, and more!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Helen Zaltzman, John Hodgman, Jesse Thorn)
